caption.p: Identification of potential tumor antigens of PAAD. a Identification of potential tumor-associated antigens of PAAD. Chromosomal distribution of up- and down-regulated genes in PAAD as indicated. b- e Identification of potential tumor-specific antigens of PAAD. Samples overlapping in ( b) altered genome fraction and ( c) mutation count groups. Genes with highest frequency in ( d) altered genome fraction and ( e) mutation count groups
